Class ProvisionVirtualInstanceCommand

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistOperation

    public class ProvisionVirtualInstanceCommand
extends KickstartScheduleCommand
    Provides frequently used data for scheduling a kickstart

    • Method Detail

      • createCobblerScheduleCommand

        public static ProvisionVirtualInstanceCommand createCobblerScheduleCommand(java.lang.Long selectedServer,
                                                           java.lang.String label,
                                                           User userIn,
                                                           java.util.Date scheduleDateIn,
                                                           java.lang.String kickstartServerNameIn)
        Creates the Kickstart Sechdule command that works with a cobbler only kickstart where the host and the target may or may *not* be the same system. If the target system does not yet exist, selectedTargetServer should be null. To be used when you want to call the store() method.
        Parameters:
        selectedServer - server to host the kickstart
        label - cobbler only profile label.
        userIn - user performing the kickstart
        scheduleDateIn - Date to schedule the KS.
        kickstartServerNameIn - the name of the server who is serving the kickstart
        Returns:
        the created cobbler only profile aware kickstartScheduleCommand

      • scheduleRebootAction

        public Action scheduleRebootAction(Action prereqAction)
        Overrides:
        scheduleRebootAction in class KickstartScheduleCommand
        Parameters:
        prereqAction - the prerequisite for this action
        Returns:
        Returns the rebootAction (if any) - null for virtual provisioning, since we don't want to reboot the host!

      • getKickstartProfiles

        public DataResult<KickstartDto> getKickstartProfiles()
        Looks up a list of applicable kickstart profiles. The list is generated based on matches between the server's base channel arch and the profile's channel arch
        Overrides:
        getKickstartProfiles in class KickstartScheduleCommand
        Returns:
        DataResult, else null if the server does not exist or does not have a base channel assigned

      • makeDefaultVirtPath

        public static java.lang.String makeDefaultVirtPath(java.lang.String name,
                                   KickstartVirtualizationType type)
        Method to set up the default virt path where the guset will be stored based on the guest name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the guest
        type - virtualization type to determine the virt paths its different for xen/kvm
        Returns:
        the virt path.

      • doValidation

        public ValidatorError doValidation()
        Do the validation needed for this command. This ensures that the system hosting the kickstart has the necessary resources to do so.
        Overrides:
        doValidation in class KickstartScheduleCommand
        Returns:
        Returns a ValidatorError, if any errors occur
